data.name: AIgarMIC
data.description: AIgarMIC – machine-learning assisted agar dilution software

evidence: “AIgarMIC is a Python package and collection of commandline scripts designed to facilitate the automation of agar dilution minimum inhibitory concentration image interpretation.”

“To install `AIgarMIC`, follow the instructions below: https://aigarmic.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html” (no mention of package managers or containers, implying source-based installation from the repo/docs).

“If you are using `AIgarMIC` in your research project, please cite: @article{geradaAIgarMICPythonPackage2024, title = {AIgarMIC: A Python Package for Automated Interpretation of Agar Dilution Minimum Inhibitory Concentration Assays} …” (indicating it directly performs research-relevant MIC assay interpretation).
